target: Sure, da vinci pizzeria is located at 20 Milton Road Chesterton postcode cb41jy, phone 01223351707. Can I help you with anything else?
context: <user>  Hi, I need a hotel that includes free wifi in the north of Cambridge. <system>  Yes I have many listings for that type of hotel,if you tell me your price range I can narrow down your options. <user>  Hotel doesn't need to have free parking. I don't care about price range. <system>  The avalon is a moderately priced guesthouse-type that matches your criteria. <user>  What is the postcode, price range, and address? <system>  The postcode for the Avalon is cb43pd, it is moderately priced hotel, and it is located at 62 gilbert road. <user>  Thank you so much. I am also looking for information on a place to dine in the same area of the hotel. I would prefer international food. <system>  Unfortunately there are no matching restaurants in the North. Would you like to try a different type of cuisine, or a different area?<user>  Maybe... are you sure there is no cheap international food in the north? <system>  No I am sorry there are no locations I have found. Is there anything else I can help you with?<user>  Since there is no cheap international restaurants, is there any Italian restaurants? <system>  There is one, Da Vinci Pizzeria, would you like to book that?<user>  Hold off on booking. Could you give me the address and phone number for it? <system>
